sources.title: Ticket to Paradise
sources.description: Title: Ticket to Paradise Summary: Janes Forbes (Barrie) decides to help amnesiac Jack Doe (Pryor) to find the details of his true identity. She doesn't tell anyone she is leaving, which causes her worried father to hire a ... Directed by: Aubrey Scotto Actors: Roger Pryor, Wendy Barrie, Claude Gillingwater Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 25 June 1936 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Janes Forbes (Barrie) decides to help amnesiac Jack Doe (Pryor) to find the details of his true identity. She doesn't tell anyone she is leaving, which causes her worried father to hire a detective to find the pair. Trouble ensues when a minor gangster with his own night club becomes involved.

sources.title: Ticket to Paradise (1936) ROMANCE
sources.description:
Stars: Roger Pryor, Wendy Barrie, Claude Gillingwater
Director: Aubrey Scotto

A young woman decides to help amnesiac find the details of his true identity. She doesn't tell anyone she is leaving, which causes her worried father to hire a detective to find the them. Trouble ensues when a gangster becomes involved.

metadata.Plot: Janes Forbes (Barrie) decides to help amnesiac Jack Doe (Pryor) to find the details of his true identity. She doesn't tell anyone she is leaving, which causes her worried father to hire a detective to find the pair. Trouble ensues when a minor gangster with his own night club becomes involved.
metadata.Writer: Jack Natteford, Nathanael West, David Silverstein
metadata.Actors: Roger Pryor, Wendy Barrie, Claude Gillingwater
